alert.note: Alert for Central Chippewa; Western Chippewa (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 02 at 10:21PM EST until December 03 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Strong winds and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph leading to white-out conditions. * WHERE...Western Chippewa and Central Chippewa Counties. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous road conditions. Roads may rapidly become snow covered under the heaviest snow bands. Winds gusting to between 40 and 55 mph will produce localized white- out conditions...which will be especially dangerous while driving. The strong winds may also bring down tree limbs and lead to isolated power outages.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
